forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -4C.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Lows overnight in the mid 20s.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear this evening then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High around 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 20-30cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Temps nearly steady around 30. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 8 to 12 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 24F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of light winter precipitation in the morning will become a mixture of rain and freezing rain in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 2-3cm of snow and ice expected.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of light winter precipitation in the morning will become a mixture of rain and freezing rain in the afternoon. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow and ice accumulations around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light freezing rain expected. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light freezing rain. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers possible in the evening with a light wintry mix developing overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers possible in the evening with a light wintry mix developing overnight. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain showers in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening changing to light rain and freezing rain overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening changing to light rain and freezing rain overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain tapering to showers. Areas of freezing rain early. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.
